message: Starting synthesis of ADHD-friendly explanation requirements. Will first check peer agent findings, then develop comprehensive guidelines.
Analyzed current explanation styles in week10/11 JSON files. Current explanations are well-structured but use some abstract language. Now developing comprehensive ADHD-friendly guidelines document.

COMPLETED: Created comprehensive ADHD-friendly explanation guidelines document at .agent-workspace/TASK-20260113-223444-46024e1a/adhd_friendly_explanation_guidelines.md. Document includes: (1) Language do's/don'ts with concrete vs abstract examples table, (2) 4-step mechanism template (starting state, key action, chain of effects, final outcome) with 3 worked examples, (3) Structure guidelines (numbered steps, bullets, short paragraphs, if-then statements, comparison tables), (4) Example writing best practices (specific not vague, show process, connect back), (5) Five common mistakes with before/after fixes, (6) Quick reference checklist for writers. Key principles established: CONCRETE over abstract, MECHANISM over labels, STRUCTURED format, EXPLICIT cause-effect, NO metaphors. Also analyzed current explanations - identified specific improvement opportunities.
